isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Model - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUNDS - BATTERY POWER DISTRIBUTION - EXTENDED DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: EXTENDED DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: Power is supplied from the vehicle batteries to the cranking motor solenoid "B" terminal on a 2/0 or 4/0 red cable. Power from the "B" terminal is supplied through a fusible link and circuit K14 to the 175 amp megafuse. Power from the fused side of the 175A megafuse is supplied on several circuits to the fuse block (1011). Each fuse provides 12 volts to the fuses connected directly to battery power. This includes circuit A15 to the key switch.
